department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: The course provides college student for required knowledge about engineering mathematics. First semester includes: P A R T A Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) CHAPTER 1 First-Order ODEs CHAPTER 2 Second-Order Linear ODEs CHAPTER 3 Higher Order Linear ODEs CHAPTER 4 Systems of ODEs. Phase Plane. Qualitative Methods CHAPTER 5 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions Second semester includes: CHAPTER 6 Laplace Transforms P A R T C Fourier Analysis. Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) P A R T D Complex Analysis
goal.ch: 本課程提供工程數學所需要的預備知識，第一學期包含解常微分方程＆Laplace transform，第二學期包含傅立葉轉換、偏微分方程以及複變分析，需要預備基本函數微分與積分的技巧以及代數，相關的基礎數學知識應用於工程以及太空科學相關領域。

content.en:
First semister include:
P A R T A Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)
CHAPTER 1 First-Order ODEs
CHAPTER 2 Second-Order Linear ODEs
CHAPTER 3 Higher Order Linear ODEs
CHAPTER 4 Systems of ODEs. Phase Plane. Qualitative Methods
CHAPTER 5 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions
Second semister include:
CHAPTER 6 Laplace Transforms
P A R T C Fourier Analysis. Partial Differential Equations (PDEs)
P A R T D Complex Analysis
